name: Conservatorio - keep it alive!
description:
This is Conservatorio, a game we made for the Ludum Dare 46 challenge with the theme "Keep it alive". 

You are a farmer and need to keep the farm and the plants alive, starting with just 100 goldpieces. You can order materials such as planters, seeds, pesticides and more in the farmhouse. You can also check the weather forcast in the newspaper. Ordered materials will be delivered to the dropzone outside, in the garden. The planters will be installed in the greenhouse. This is where you can plant the seeds.

Make sure to water the plants in time and have some pesticides at hand. You also need to keep an eye out on your energybar and on the time. If plants are matured, make sure to harvest them in time. The harvest may be dropped in the dropzone, it will then automaticly be sold at night.

You can play the game here in the browser, or download the stand alone client here from itch.io. A small donation if you liked the game is appreciated.
